content: 4 5 6 7 times more knitting try to keep your floats at the back of the work quite loose one stitch decreased s2kpo slip next 2 sts as if to k2tog k1 then 39 43 47 51 55 59 sts particularly over the spot pattern as pulling too tightly will result in pass 2 slipped sts over st s stitch es st st stocking stitch cont in st st until back measures 25 27 30 33 37 41 cm puckered fabric /10 10½ 11¾ 13 14½ 16 in from cast on edge note ending with a p row suggested alternative colourways when working from chart right side k row are read from right to shape shoulders left and wrong side p row from left to right cast off 7 8 9 10 11 12 sts at beg of next 2 row 25 27 29 31 33 35 sts cast off storm snow fawn seaside daisy grass 102 124 160 161 yellow 141 142 © millamia all rights reserved www millamia com front work in patt from chart to end of row 42 repeat the last 2 row 1 2 3 4 5 6 times more cont in st st and m only 16 17 18 19 20 21 sts with 3mm us 2 needles and c cast on 54 58 66 70 78 82 sts work straight until front measures 15 16 18 20 23 26 cm keeping armhole edge straight cont to decrease at neck edge 1st rib row k2 p2 k2 to end /6 6¼ 7 8 9 10¼ in from cast on edge ending with a p row on 6 6 4 4 4 4 foll alt row then every foll 4th row until 2nd rib row p2 k2 p2 to end shape armholes 7 8 9 10 11 12 sts rem repeat the last 2 row 2 3 4 5 6 7 times more increase 1 3 1 3 1 3 sts cast off 5 sts at beg of next 2 row 45 51 57 63 69 75 sts cont straight until front measures same as back to shoulder evenly across last row 55 61 67 73 79 85 sts shape front neck ending at armhole edge change to 3 25mm us 3 needles next row skpo k18 21 24 27 30 33 k2 decrease turn and work on shape shoulder these sts for first side of front neck cast off key next row p to end with right side facing slip centre st onto a safety pin join on yarn petal 122 m storm 102 c next row skpo k to last 2 sts k2 decrease to rem sts next row skpo k to last 2 sts k2 decrease 42 next row p to end next row skpo k to last 2 sts k2 decrease repeat the last 2 row 1 2 3 4 5 6 times more 16 17 18 19 20 21 sts keeping armhole edge straight cont to decrease at neck
